protocol.name: P-GSE38282-1
text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)
DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-2
protocol.text: Aerial parts of the 14-day-old seedlings were excised from the seedlings and collected for total RNA extraction.

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seeds from wild-type and GFP-TIE1-15 were placed on half-strength Murashige and Skoog (1/2 MS) medium. The plates were put in 4 °C refrigerator for 3 days to complete synchronization before being placed at 22±2 °C under long day conditions (16-h light and 8-h dark) for 14 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-4
protocol.text: The QIAgen RNeasy Total RNA Extraction Kit was used to extract total RNA according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-5
protocol.text: Biotin-labeled cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Arrays. The standard wash and double-stain protocols (EukGE-WS2v5-450) were applied using an Affymetrix GeneChip Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-7
protocol.text: The arrays were scanned on an Affymetrix GeneChip scanner 3000.

protocol.name: P-GSE38282-8
protocol.text: The scanned arrays were analyzed first with Affymetrix GCOS 1.0 (MAS 5.0) software to generate detection calls. Both data sets were normalized using Affymetrix GCOS software, and the TGT value was set to 100.
